Organism_Record.Function_Summary: Regulatory protein of the TOL plasmid xyl operons. In the presence of m-xylene or m-methylbenzyl alcohol xylR activates both the xylCMABN operon and the regulatory gene xylS; xylS itself activates the xylXYZLTEGFJQKIH operon. XylR interacts with sigma-54.

Funtion.Detail: Interacting selectively and non-covalently with a transcription factor, any protein required to initiate or regulate transcription.
Any molecular function by which a gene product interacts selectively with DNA (deoxyribonucleic acid).
Protein that positively regulates either the transcription of one or more genes, or the translation of mRNA.

Interacting selectively and non-covalently with a nucleotide, any compound consisting of a nucleoside that is esterified with (ortho)phosphate or an oligophosphate at any hydroxyl group on the ribose or deoxyribose.

Interacting selectively and non-covalently with a specific DNA sequence in order to modulate transcription. The transcription factor may or may not also interact selectively with a protein or macromolecular complex.
Funtion.Keyword: Sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity

Funtion.Detail: Interacting selectively and non-covalently with ATP, adenosine 5'-triphosphate, a universally important coenzyme and enzyme regulator.
Catalysis of the reaction: a nucleoside triphosphate + H2O = nucleoside diphosphate + phosphate.

BioProcess.Detail: The cellular synthesis of RNA on a template of DNA.

A conserved series of molecular signals found in prokaryotes and eukaryotes; involves autophosphorylation of a histidine kinase and the transfer of the phosphate group to an aspartate that then acts as a phospho-donor to response regulator proteins.
The cellular synthesis of either RNA on a template of DNA or DNA on a template of RNA.
Any process that modulates the frequency, rate or extent of the synthesis of either RNA on a template of DNA or DNA on a template of RNA.
The chemical reactions and pathways resulting in the breakdown of aromatic compounds, any substance containing an aromatic carbon ring.

PDB.PDB_Title: Model of Transcriptional regulatory protein xylR
